item.title: Nice plasma shortcut
item.author: nikolavp@gmail.com (Nikola Petrov)
item.description: Today while i was looking at kdevelop4 to see the new stuff i clicked accidentally and plasma showed up in front of me. I am using this shortcut more and more and it is really a huge fun. For example to see what’s the time or notes on the Desktop. The new folder view also :). The little things made the difference once more :)
